"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-publish-tiddler/macro/publish-filter","tags":"$:/tags/Macro","text":"\define publishFilter()

\end
